column5: Cozy 1700+ sq ft family friendly house with all the comforts of home. This is our vacation home where we stay on long trips to visit family, so comfort & convenience is important to us. We made the home a great place for a family to relax with amazing amenities for families with young children or groups of adults. We are so excited to be able to share this with other families/groups looking for a charming place to stay!
column8: 3 Bedroom Family Friendly House w/ Southern Charm
